fields.label: Occupational Status
fields.summary: Tick Employed or Unemployed/Not Yet Employed. If pre-employment, select Unemployed/Not Yet Employed. First-time job seekers: check the box.

fields.label: Membership Category
fields.summary: Select one: Employed (Private/Government/Foreign/Private Household), Self-Employed, Professional/Business Owner, Job Order Personnel, Non-Working Spouse, OFW/Immigrant, Member of Cooperative/Trade Union/Religious Group, Other Earning Group, Pensioner/Investor/Lessor, or Others (specify).

fields.label: Pag-IBIG MID / RTN (Fund Use Only)
fields.summary: Leave blank; to be filled by Pag-IBIG (MID Number and Registration Tracking Number).

fields.label: Member’s Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle. Add Name Extension (Jr., II) if any. Check 'No Middle Name' only if applicable.

fields.label: Parents / Spouse
fields.summary: Provide full names of Father and Mother (maiden name). If married, write Spouse’s full name.

fields.label: Name as in Birth Certificate
fields.summary: If different, indicate the exact name appearing on the birth certificate.

fields.label: Date & Place of Birth
fields.summary: Enter birth date (MM/DD/YYYY) and place (City/Municipality/Province/Country if born abroad).

fields.label: Citizenship & Sex
fields.summary: State citizenship and tick Male or Female.

fields.label: Civil/Marital Status
fields.summary: Choose Single/Unmarried, Married, Widowed/er, Annulled, or Legally Separated.

fields.label: IDs & Numbers
fields.summary: Provide TIN and SSS/GSIS Number, Employee Number (and AFP/PNP Serial/Badge or DepEd Division/Station Code if applicable), and CRN if available.

fields.label: Physical Identifiers
fields.summary: Indicate height (cm), weight (kg), and any prominent distinguishing facial features (e.g., moles, scars).

fields.label: Permanent Home Address
fields.summary: Unit/Room/Floor, Building, Lot/Block/Phase, House No., Street, Subdivision, Barangay, Municipality/City, Province/State/Country, ZIP Code.

fields.label: Present Home Address
fields.summary: Provide the same details if different from permanent address.

fields.label: Preferred Mailing Address
fields.summary: Choose Present Home, Permanent Home, or Employer/Business Address.

fields.label: Contact Numbers & Email
fields.summary: Include country/area codes for Home, Cell Phone, Business (Direct/Trunk + Local) and an active email.

fields.label: Savings Payment Frequency
fields.summary: If not via payroll deduction, choose Monthly, Quarterly, Semi-Annually, or Annually.

fields.label: Occupation & Employment Status
fields.summary: State your job/occupation. Tick Permanent/Regular, Contractual, Project-based, Casual, or Part-time/Temporary.

fields.label: Type of Work (OFW only)
fields.summary: Tick Land-based or Sea-based and specify country of assignment.

fields.label: Employer/Business Name & Address
fields.summary: Write the employer/business name and full office address. Mark Office Assignment as Head Office or Branch (specify).

fields.label: Date Employed (Month, Year)
fields.summary: Provide the month and year you started with the current employer.

fields.label: Monthly Income
fields.summary: Indicate Basic + Allowances/Others = Total Monthly Income.

fields.label: Employer History
fields.summary: List each employer with Office Assignment (Head Office/Branch), full address, and From/To (MM/YYYY). Use extra sheets if needed.

fields.label: Heirs List
fields.summary: For each heir, provide Last, First, Name Extension, Middle (check 'No Middle Name' only if true), Relationship, and Date of Birth. Follow the New Civil Code rules on succession.

fields.label: Member’s Declaration
fields.summary: Sign and date to certify correctness and authorize processing of personal data under the Data Privacy Act of 2012.

fields.label: Receiving Details (Fund Use Only)
fields.summary: For Pag-IBIG staff: Received by (signature over printed name), Designation/Position, Branch/Unit, and Date.
